product_name: bareMineralsSKINLONGEVITY Revitalizing Eye Cream with Niacinamide
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganbareMinerals SKINLONGEVITY Revitalizing Eye Cream with Niacinamide is a refreshing gel cream that brightens, smooths, and de-puffs the eye area, while strengthening skin barrier to combat signs of aging and restore radiance.
details: DetailsBenefitsThis hydrating eye cream reduces fine lines and wrinkles in 93% of users, boosts radiance by 30% after 4 weeks, and diminishes dark circles by 28% after 4 weeks.Formulated with our exclusive Mineral Herb Complex, this gel cream soothes and strengthens the skin's barrier for nourished, brightened under eyes*.Gluten-free + formulated without synthetic fragrance, PEGs and moreDermatologist-testedSuitable for all skin types and tonesSafe for sensitive skinResearch ResultsClinically proven to improve texture around the eye by 25% ​after 4 weeksClinically proven to help reduce puffiness by 22%​ after four weeksClinically proven to reduce Fine Lines & Wrinkles by 18% after four weeks*Based on an independent clinical study after four weeks​Key IngredientsMineral Herb Complex - Mineral-rich plant-based complex to help fight the signs of agingZinc-infused niacinamide - Reduce fine lines, wrinkles, and inflammation to improve the skin barrierCalifornia Poppy - Offers antioxidant protection to help guard skin from environmental damageItem 2640405How To UseUse twice daily, morning and night after cleansing. Gently pat a small amount onto eye area.Take a pearl-sized amount of eye cream on your ring finger.Gently pat along the under eye, from the inner corner to the brow bone.Creating a 360 application around the entire eye. Use morning and night for a refreshed look.IngredientsWater (Aqua/Eau), Propanediol, Glycerin, Dipropylene Glycol, Pentaerythrityl Tetraethylhexanoate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Dimethicone, Jojoba Esters, Theobroma Grandiflorum Seed Butter, C9-12 Alkane, Trehalose, Cellulose, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, Butylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Potassium Hydroxide, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Ascorbyl Glucoside, Bisabolol, Caffeine, Magnesium Stearate, Niacinamide, Raphanus Sativus (Radish) Seed Extract, Sodium Citrate, Glyceryl Acrylate/Acrylic Acid Copolymer, Peucedanum Japonicum Extract, Eschscholzia Californica Leaf Cell Extract, T-Butyl Alcohol, Cedrus Atlantica Bark Extract, Citric Acid, Centella Asiatica Leaf Extract, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use twice daily, morning and night after cleansing. Gently pat a small amount onto eye area.Take a pearl-sized amount of eye cream on your ring finger.Gently pat along the under eye, from the inner corner to the brow bone.Creating a 360 application around the entire eye. Use morning and night for a refreshed look.

reviews.headline: It's an ok product.
reviews.comments: I think this product can be a good product to some just not for me. I did receieve this product in exchange for a review with that being said I have very dry undereyes but it looks like i put straight oil to my undereyes and i dont like that lol… a lil goes a long way with this product so i didnt use alot either. I havent noticed a difference while using this product… I also feel like it sits on your skin and its not the best as far as eye creams go. I can get something with niacinamide and more moisture for a better price point.

faceoff_positive.comments:
I've not used bareMinerals before, so this was my first experience with this brand. I was provided the product to try without cost to me.
My first impression of the product was that the cream felt soft and light on my fingers as I was beginning to apply it to my skin. I appreciate that it had little to no fragrance, as that is very irritating to my eyes. Let me clarify "little to no fragrance": I mean that there was no added fragrance to the product, and its smell was the natural product and minimal and nothing unpleasant.
I applied this around my eyes and under my eyes. It felt like it absorbed well into my skin. I didn't feel like I had product sitting on top of my skin or felt heavy; I appreciated the light feeling when I first applied the product.
As I continued to use the SKINLONGEVITY® Revitalizing Eye Cream with Niacinamide for a couple of weeks, I noticed a reduction in my fine lines around my eyes; my dark circles were slightly faded. I have some puffiness in my lids, making me have a more hooded eye look. This eye cream seemed to diminish my lid puffiness by a noticeable amount, and this helped my eyes look more like they did when I was younger.
Compared to other eye cream brands I've used, I liked this product. It felt very natural, and I felt confident in its ingredients. 
One problem I did have with this product was that I noticed I had some filminess on my eyes in the morning. I feel this may be due to my application and use rather than to the product. If I am getting it in my eyes, though, I don't notice any stinging; I just notice the filminess when I wake up, which I usually can just splash some water on my face to rinse that filminess away.
Overall, I'm very pleased with this eye cream and very pleased with the results. This was a great introduction to the bareMinerals brand, and I would be willing to explore their products more, given the feel, experience, and overall effectiveness of this eye cream.
faceoff_positive.headline: A Nice Feeling Eye Cream

faceoff_negative.comments: I have been using the Skinlongevity revitalizing eye cream in the morning and at night for about a week. I especially love how it absorbs quickly and doesn't leave my eyes feeling oily or mess up my concealer! It is hydrating and does have some brightening effects although not hugely noticeable. I have noticed a little improvement in fine lines and that may continue to get better over time. I really like that it's made with natural ingredients, the plant based mineral herb complex is a unique ingredient. I will definitely keep using and hope to see more improvement!
faceoff_negative.headline: Hydrating, absorbs quickly, I love the natural ingredients
